main event: A civilian in Loudonville, Ohio reported a sighting of a V-shaped object with rough edges, which then appeared oval and smooth, changing direction from S-SE to SW.
interesting points: The object was described to be very bright and hot initially, then changed shape and direction.
The sighting was not only reported by the civilian but also by 5 to 6 other people.
The observation was made using both naked eye and high-powered field glasses, lasting for 6 minutes.
The witness reported clear weather and visibility during the sighting.
No identifying information was provided for the other witnesses.
sighted object: V-shaped object with rough edges changing to oval and smooth
